content.rendered:
[divide margin_top=”10″ margin_bottom=”10″ color=”#a0a0a0″]

An important part of Becta’s role is to create a more exciting, rewarding and successful experience for learners of all ages and abilities, enabling them to achieve their potential. Becta’s strategy, Harnessing Technology: Next Generation Learning, addresses the needs of learners of all ages across the education and skills system.

Publication Date: 2009
